articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Netflix's $100 Million JLo Blockbuster Is Reviewing Worse Than 'Rebel Moon' - Forbes
articles.description: Netflix will occasionally throw lots of money at huge action blockbusters, despite no theatrical release planned. With Atlas, that has not gone well.
articles.content:
Atlas
Netflix
Netflix will occasionally throw lots of money at huge action blockbusters, despite no theatrical release planned. Sometimes that works out. Movies like Red Notice and Heart of Stone h… [+2471 chars]
